name: Saint Albans City, Franklin County, VT

properties.1-Family Min. # Parking Spaces: None if lot is under 1 acre. Otherwise, 2 spaces
properties.Tooltip Notes: Public Hearing required if dwelling units are located on first floor or at density higher than 2,000 sq.ft. of lot space per dwelling unit.

properties.1-Family Front Setback: Average of neighboring properties within 200 feet

properties.4+-Family Front Setback: Average of neighboring properties within 200 feet
properties.Tooltip Notes: Public hearing required for 3- and 4-unit housing if lot area is less than 0.17 acres per unit. Public hearing required for all 5+ unit housing.
